headline: Kessler Topaz Meltzer & Check, LLP Reminds Edison International Investors of Important Deadline in Securities Fraud Class Action Lawsuit
summary: The law firm of Kessler Topaz Meltzer & Check, LLP informs investors that a securities class action lawsuit has been filed against Edison International on behalf of those who purchased or otherwise...
